SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJECT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJ_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CMD#, " project &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : PRINT "Switching to project: &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" : PRINT &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJ_CMD#
&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_PROJ_CMD#
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_STATUS@UNIX

DOCU_Docu.DOC: To switch project name in Openshift for Windows environment
